description: Updates the configuration for a knowledge base that has been associated with an agent.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the agent associated with the knowledge base that you want to update.

parameters.name: agentVersion
parameters.description: The version of the agent associated with the knowledge base that you want to update.

parameters.name: knowledgeBaseId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the knowledge base that has been associated with an agent.

nested_items.name: agentKnowledgeBase
nested_items.description: Contains details about the knowledge base that has been associated with an agent.

nested_items.name: agentId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the agent with which the knowledge base is associated.

nested_items.name: agentVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the agent with which the knowledge base is associated.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the association between the agent and the knowledge base was created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the association between the agent and the knowledge base.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the association between the agent and the knowledge base.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseState
nested_items.description: Specifies whether to use the knowledge base or not when sending an InvokeAgent request.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the association between the agent and the knowledge base was last updated.
